resources.string: Brown ground beef, sauté onions and garlic, add tomato sauce and Italian herbs. Serve over cooked spaghetti.
Sauté chicken, onions, garlic, and ginger. Add curry spices and coconut milk. Simmer until chicken is cooked.
Slice tomatoes and fresh mozzarella. Arrange on a plate with fresh basil leaves. Drizzle with balsamic glaze.
Spread sushi rice on nori, add fish, avocado, and cucumber. Roll tightly and slice into pieces.
Cook chicken, prepare fettuccine pasta, and mix with Alfredo sauce. Top with grated Parmesan cheese.
Mash avocados, dice tomatoes, onions, and cilantro. Mix with lime juice and salt.
Roll out pizza dough, spread tomato sauce, add fresh mozzarella, and bake. Top with fresh basil.
Sauté chicken strips with bell peppers and onions. Season with fajita spices. Serve in tortillas.
Sauté shrimp, garlic, and lemon in white wine. Serve over linguine.
Blend chickpeas, tahini, garlic, and lemon juice until smooth. Serve with pita bread.
